title: Sheridan's world of society: 18th century London (TEFC)
creator_credit: James Wilkins, Seabourne Enterprises and ICEM
brief_description: Traces the life of Richard Brinsley Sheridan and evokes the leisurely world of 18th century English society, which enjoyed his plays but never accepted him into its midst. Contemporary paintings and cartoons reveal the favourite pastimes of this society, including a performance of “The school for scandal”.
